scripts.name: Direct download from Nokia Ovi Store (WaybackMachine Backup)
scripts.description: Replaces the Download Button on the Nokia Ovi Store to allow direct downloads from the backup version of the website.

scripts.name: HackintoshShop.com unlock
scripts.description: Unlock HackintoshShop.com website if you're browsing with an ad-block and you see just a blue page with a 3 dots loader or an orange page with a circular loader. It also skips the "Download Terms" confirmation dialogue window that appears before you actually get to the real download buttons. By the way, I would rather avoid downloading hacked software form such a greedy site.

scripts.name: Dasolo/Italiashare direct links
scripts.description: This script replaces ad.ly links with direct links on DaSolo/Italiashare

scripts.name: Direct download from Google Play
scripts.description: Adds APK-DL, APKPure, APKCombo, APKPremier, APKMirror and Evozi download buttons to Google Play Store when browsing apps.

scripts.name: TestYourBond Cheater
scripts.description: Avoid quarrelling with your friends because you didn't catch the right answer to all their questions (even if some are really stupid, like "Which mobile OS does John prefers: 1)Android 2)iOS"). This script makes the correct answer appear bold.

scripts.name: Bypass paywalls for scientific documents
scripts.description: Bypass paywalls for scientific documents by downloading them from sci-hub instead of paying something like 50 bucks for each paper. This script adds download buttons on Google Scholar, Scopus and Web Of Science, which lead to sci-hub.tw. In this way you can get free access to scientific papers even if you (or your university) can't afford their prices.
scripts.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or later

scripts.name: Remove download delay on APKLeecher
scripts.description: Removes download delay on APKLeecher

scripts.name: Indeed: separate sponsored jobs from search
scripts.description: Separate sponsored jobs from search making them appear yellow. Useful to distinguish those jobs you've not searched for, but are in the results just because they're sponsored.

scripts.name: Quora: remove sponsored posts
scripts.description: Remove sponsored posts that are shown as relevant answers even if they're not.

scripts.name: Tiscali Notizie Video
scripts.description: Uno script per vedere i video di Tiscali Notizie anche col blocco pubblicitario attivo, in un player HTML5, senza pubblicità e senza autoplay forzato.

scripts.name: Microsoft Store Direct Download
scripts.description: Adds direct download links to Microsoft Store when browsing apps.

scripts.name: Bypass FileCrypt
scripts.description: Bypass FileCrypt and get the original link!

scripts.name: Select and copy lyrics from music.oricon.co.jp
scripts.description: Allows lyrics selection and copy on music.oricon.co.jp

scripts.name: Remove redirection tracking from Qwant Lite
scripts.description: A script that removes redirection tracking from Qwant Lite.

scripts.name: Use Meetic mobile also in landscape
scripts.description: This script removes the overlay suggesting portrait orientation.

scripts.name: Download photos from Badoo
scripts.description: Download photos from Badoo. Useful to check if they are stolen photos appearing somewhere else on the web using Google Images or Tineye.

scripts.name: Oracle Java download without login
scripts.description: Replaces license agreement and subsequent login form with a direct link to download the desired Java (JRE, JDK, etc.) package.

scripts.name: Fix scrollbar on exploit-db
scripts.description: Fix for the scrollbar not appearing on exploit-db.

scripts.name: Le Parisiene remove paywall
scripts.description: Removes the paywall for Le Parisiene articles.

scripts.name: AllDataSheet: straight to PDF
scripts.description: With this script you will directly go to the PDF version of the datasheet when you click on the PDF icon in the search results.

scripts.name: Tinder catfishing prevention tool
scripts.description: This script has two functions: you can download the current picture of the shown profile to search it on the web using tools like Google Images reverse search, or you can directly check it for duplicates on TinEye. The purpose of this script is to help preventing catfishing. The script works both on desktop and mobile view.

scripts.name: ONlovee: Private photos and advanced search FREE
scripts.description: See all private photos of any user and use the paid advanced search FOR FREE
scripts.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or later

scripts.name: Polimi Career Service: late subscriptions
scripts.description: This script enables the event subscription form even if the subscriptions are already closed. There's no warranty that the late subscription will be taken in account, but at least with this script you can try.
scripts.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or later

scripts.name: Tinder: show teasers (deblur)
scripts.description: Show the last people who liked you for free: this script deblurs the photos of the teasers, revealing the people who liked you. This script only allows you to see those photos: you can't directly access the profiles like you would do with a paid account.

scripts.name: Rimuovi elementi venduti da Subito.it
scripts.description: Rimuove dall'elenco degli oggetti cercati quelli già venduti, che è inutile mostrare perché ovviamente non possono essere acquistati. Funziona sia con la versione desktop che mobile del sito.
scripts.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

scripts.name: Foto a risoluzione massima su Subito.it
scripts.description: Osserva le foto a risoluzione massima su Subito.it. Clicca sulla foto per aprirla in una nuova scheda a dimensioni massime.
scripts.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

scripts.name: Unblur examples on Reverso

scripts.description: Scegli a chi intitolare l'Aeroporto di Malpensa: questo script rimpiazza ogni riferimento a Silvio Berlusconi con un nome a tua scelta.
